summary: Raymond "Mundo" Earwood  was an American country music singer-songwriter.
full_text: Raymond "Mundo" Earwood  was an American country music singer-songwriter. Earwood's eponymous debut album was released by Excelsior Records in 1981. His most successful single, "Things I'd Do for You", reached the Top 20 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart in 1978. For a time, he also recorded as Mundo Ray.
title: Mundo Earwood
